name: cpsit/quality-tools
description: A collection of tools for quality assurance in TYPO3 projects.

scripts-descriptions.fix: Apply all available code fixes (composer, editorconfig, php, rector)
scripts-descriptions.fix:composer: Fix Composer configuration format and sorting
scripts-descriptions.fix:php: Fix PHP coding style violations using PHP CS Fixer
scripts-descriptions.fix:rector: Apply Rector code modernization and refactoring rules
scripts-descriptions.lint: Run all linting checks (composer, editorconfig, php, rector, static analysis)
scripts-descriptions.lint:composer: Check Composer configuration format without modifying files
scripts-descriptions.lint:editorconfig: Check EditorConfig compliance without modifying files
scripts-descriptions.lint:php: Check PHP coding style without modifying files
scripts-descriptions.lint:rector: Check Rector rules without applying changes (dry-run)
scripts-descriptions.sca:php: Run PHPStan static analysis with 1GB memory limit
scripts-descriptions.test:coverage: Generate test coverage report (HTML and text formats)
scripts-descriptions.test:coverage-clover: Generate Clover XML coverage report for CI/CD
scripts-descriptions.test:unit: Run unit tests only (fast, isolated tests)
